LanguageData.Recipe_MakeCrateMaxim.label: make maxim machine gun crate
LanguageData.Recipe_MakeCrateMaxim.description: make a maxim machine gun crate. you need this to build maxim turret.
LanguageData.Recipe_MakeCrate50cal.label: make .50Cal machine gun crate
LanguageData.Recipe_MakeCrate50cal.description: make a .50Cal machine gun crate. you need this to build M2 turret.
LanguageData.Recipe_MakeCrateOerlikon.label: make 20mm machine gun crate
LanguageData.Recipe_MakeCrateOerlikon.description: make a Oerlikon 20mm machine gun crate. You need this to build Oerlikon turret.
LanguageData.Recipe_MakeCrate40mm_gun.label: make 40mm machine gun crate
LanguageData.Recipe_MakeCrate40mm_gun.description: make a Bofors 40mm anti aircraft artillery crate. You need this to build Bofors turret.
